scripts.pages:setup: sh -c 'git worktree remove --force /tmp/gh-pages >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; git worktree prune; rm -rf /tmp/gh-pages; git worktree add --force --checkout /tmp/gh-pages gh-pages'
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build && npm run pages:sync && cd /tmp/gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m "Publish learning build" && git push origin gh-pages
